# format(_:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a locale-aware string representation from a duration value.

## Declaration

```swift
func format(_ value: Duration) -> String
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The duration value to format.

## Return Value

A string representation of the duration, according to the style’s pattern and locale.

## Discussion

Use this method when you want to create a format style and repeatedly use it to format different durations. For one-off cases with default formatting, call the [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Swift/Duration/formatted(_:)] method of [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Swift/Duration] instead.
